name: Wetrade Technologies Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an investment application intended to invest in the capital markets. The company's platform offers to trade stocks and ETFs in the United States and the Philippines and also provides security for the funds and build portfolios, enabling financial institutions' data encryption and empowering the next generation of investors.
one_liner: Operator of an investment application intended to invest in the capital markets. The company's platform offers to trade stocks and ETFs in the United States and the Philippines and also provides security for the funds and build portfolios, enabling financial institutions' data encryption and empowering the next generation of investors.
